title: Ricerca tramite google non carica nulla
content:
Salve a tutti

ho questo problema, quando scrivo nella barra dell'indirizzo google mi carica il link di quello che cerco ma non carica la pagina, ho svuotato cache ma unico modo per risolvere "temporaneamente" il problema e chiudere e riaprire il browser, vedete immagine, io cerco una parola premo invio e la pagina non cambia ma cambia solo indirizzo, con altri motori di ricerca preinstallati in firefox il problema non si presenta con quello che ho provato, voi sapete come risolvere?
creator: zeus89ita

title: Searching in Firefox
content: Hi there, I'll have several tabs open and when opening a new tab/window, suddenly nothing happens when I type something. It's not specific pages, it's anything. I found somewhere that I could Clear my latest History, which helped momentarily, but the problem came back. Why is this?
creator: bodilhstein

title: No Firefox on my desktop computer in south east London UK
content: Please tell me what do. From time to time, Firefox will not connect my desktop to the internet. At the same time I can access the internet with my iPhone. The internet in my home is working. Right now the computer cannot connect to internet site or restore previous tabs.
creator: gartland44

title: Time showing on some sites differ from sytem time.
content: Hello! When entering some (in tis case financial: https://www.nordnet.se/se) sites the time shown are exactly 2hours behind the system time. If system time is 11:15 (correct time zone in Sweden) the time shown on the site is 09:15. This is probably something that has to do with an update of Firefox. I have automatic update to Firefox but the problem has been there for some months although I have not been able to recognice it until the recent week. I have tried a "clean" new install of Firefox to a new directory with no import of bookmarks or anything but the problem is exactly the same. For your information I have tried a clean install of Duckduckgo browser which do not suffer this problem. But I want to keep with Firefox which I have used since at least 15years. I guess there is a "timestamp" or samething that have gone wrong, but should be easy to correct if you just know where to look. Best regards /Gunnar
creator: gunnar37

title: Uninstalling hangs at the start of the process
content:
I'm trying to remove Firefox from a laptop. When I start the uninstall process it reaches the progress bar that says Unisntalling Firefox... and hangs there. 30 minutes and no discernable change.

All the buttons on the dialog are disabled and the only way to get out of it is to restart the computer.
creator: saurbaum

title: URL suggestions don't show bookmarked or pinned sites as first option
content:
Hello, everytime I want to open a website that I frequently use, Firefox fails to suggest it as first and rather suggests the "base" url. Example: I want to open https://www.arabdict.com/en/deutsch-arabisch but typing "ara" in the URL input field always suggests https://www.arabdict.com although the first link is both bookmarked and pinned on home. Can someone tell me how to fix this if it's even fixable yet? Chrome does this if you want to compare the user experience I'm missing since switching to Firefox. Thank you!

P.S: sorry for the first screenshot, I couldn't catch the suggestions menu with the built in screenshot tool.
creator: Adam.I

title: Firefox 129.0.2 has bugs
content: Hello. The latest update of FireFox 129.0.2 still has intermittent crashes. Sometimes I can't access my Google searches or links in emails don't work, then it works, then it starts to malfunction again. I have to restart my PC. Could you release a patch that works as well as before FireFox 129.0? On the other hand, Canal+ works perfectly Thanks. Kind regards.
creator: czoppigor06

creator: marsxxl2009

title: Google Photos, when editing photos, creates visual issues in Firefox (works fine in Chrome) - graphics settings?
content:
When I try to edit & crop in Google Photos, I get the image artifacts as you can see in the image with lines and the image doesn't correct itself so it's impossible to edit well. If I save the image after all the lines are added, then reload it will show but then I have to start the crop over again to get both sides.

This works fine in Google Chrome, so there is some issue with the Firefox browser on my laptop. graphics: Intel Iris Xe Graphics 1920x1080 x 8bit 60.05 Hz refresh rate

What could be causing an issue on Firefox but not Chrome?
creator: the_alchemist

title: Web page audio stops when pressing skip button on video too much
content:
When I'm watching a show, sometimes I get uncomfortable during certain parts and will click the "skip" button a couple times until the scene is over. However, sometimes If I do this too many times the audio will completely stop (but the video continues playing). I will need to refresh the page for it to fix.

I've tried running firefox in troubleshooting mode but the issue seemed to still be there. Doesnt happen on any other browsers either.
creator: jessi.emilyyy

title: Puzzling question
content: Signed into Wall Street Journal. Clicked on a subject. Got this on a screen Application error: a client-side exception has occurred (see the browser console for more information). Tried to ask the question at WSJ, Their trees are hard to get through. What is a browser console?
creator: 2ccbrock

title: media load issue
content: I've been trying to watch live sports events on SECN+ through my Hulu subscription, but I'm encountering an error message stating, "The media could not be loaded, either because the server or network failed or because the format is not supported." I discovered that Firefox is blocking the stream, while it works perfectly on Chrome. With the college football season and other sports events approaching, I’m concerned that if this issue persists, I may have to stop using Firefox, which I've relied on for over two decades. Please help me fix this issue at your earliest convenience. Thanks.
creator: hyoungkoo.khang
